overview:
Jeff brings over 20 years of experience in media - holding creative, strategic and senior management positions within Grey Advertising (HK), WPP, EMAP, Microsoft, BSkyB and Liberty Media.

Within the last 16 years, Jeff has successfully built, managed and grown teams within large corporate and start-up environments, as well as being responsible for multi-million dollar P&Ls. Career highlights include:

  • Establishing and building EMAP’s consumer online business
  • First Creative Directorship of MSN UK, and establishing the first iteration of MSN’s online production environment, Atlantis
  • Launching Sky Interactive, the UK’s leading and most successful interactive/enhanced TV service, including Sky Sports Interactive
  • Building/consolidating BSkyB’s combined interactive service division
  • Launching PlayJam, the world’s most successful independent interactive TV games channel
  • Launching EA’s online casual games business, Pogo, in the UK, France and Germany.
